directions: Follow recipe for Creamy Macaroni and Cheese, adding broccoli to the boiling pasta during the last 3 minutes of cooking. Drain, then proceed to make the cheese sauce as directed. Stir chicken, tomatoes and basil along with the sauce into the hot pasta. Serve hot.
ingredients: 1 cup fresh Italian plum tomatoes, seeded if desired
1/4 cup fresh basil leaves, torn into pieces or snipped with scissors
title: Macaroni and Cheese with Chicken and Broccoli
